articles.author: Aaron Couch
articles.title: Francis Ford Coppola’s ‘Megalopolis’ Lands at Lionsgate for Fall Release - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The pricey passion project, which debuted at Cannes last month, has found its home for North American distribution.
articles.content:
After much speculation over its fate, Megalopolis is officially headed to North American movie theaters. 
Lionsgate has picked up the Francis Ford Coppola feature and is planning a Sept. 27 release … [+3645 chars]

articles.author: Haley Ott
articles.title: American man among tourists reported missing in Greece amid deadly heat waves - CBS News
articles.description: A local rescuer in Greece says "it defies logic" that people are risking walks alone in such extreme heat.
articles.content: Three tourists, including one American, have died and two others remain missing in Greece as the country faces extreme temperatures amid a string of heat waves, which have prompted authorities to clo… [+2737 chars]
